shapes

Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Shape
      • shapes.Circle
        • shapes.RegularPolygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Star

    public class RegularPolygon
extends Circle
    Represents a regular Polygon on the canvas. It is equilateral and equiangular. This implementation of RegularPolygon is always convex (non-intersecting). Therefore, it only extends Circle by one additional attribute, the number of edges.
    See Also:
    Circle, Shape, Star, Serialized Form

      Creates a new RegularPolygon with default attributes.

      Creates a new RegularPolygon with the specified attributes and default Circle attributes.
